title: Rodney King: "The Riot Within"
description: Michael's conversation with the late Rodney King, on his memoir "The Riot Within: My Journey from Rebellion to Redemption." Original air date 27 April 2012. The book was published on 24 April 2012. Mr. King passed away on 17 June 2012.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Rodney King)
